tranche"},"createToken(bytes32,bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"creates new token shell (status pending), safes information in storage","params":{"_granularity":"ensures, that granularity of shares is always a positive natural figure, cannot be changed ever"}},"decimals()":{"details":"number of decimals token uses, divide token amount by number of decimals to get user representation"},"delegate(address)":{"details":"possibility to delegate your vote to another voter"},"getAllAddressesEquityToken()":{"details":"getter for TotalDistribution array","return":"array with all addresses (owner)"},"getDefaultTranches(address)":{"details":"mandatory for backward interoperability with ERC777 and ERC20"},"getInfosEquityToken()":{"details":"returns Infos of equity token, as struct is not returnable in current solidity version"},"granularity()":{"details":"smallest part of token not divisible"},"isOperatorFor(address,address)":{"return":"true if _operator is authorized for _tokenHolder"},"sendAdHocMessage(string)":{"details":"possibility to broadcast adHocMessages for any size"},"setDocument(bytes32,string,bytes32)":{"details":"manage documents associated with token, using IPFS encrypted peer-to-peer filesharing"},"totalSupply()":{"details":"total amount of a token "},"tranchesOf(address)":{"details":"tranches of a proposal"},"winningProposal()":{"details":"computes the winning proposal, gets proposal name from array and returns, fires event"}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"allowance(address,address)":{"notice":"ERC20 mandatory"},"approve(address,uint256)":{"notice":"ERC20 mandatory"},"authorizeAdvocate(address)":{"notice":"authorize a third party _operator to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens. msg.sender always operator himself, thus requirementERC777 mandatory"},"authorizeOperator(address)":{"notice":"authorize a third party _operator to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens. msg.sender always operator himself, thus requirementERC777 mandatory"},"authorizeRequest(address)":{"notice":"advocate can approve investor to another level of accreditation; 0 = no investor, 1 = approved investor, 2 = advocate"},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"ERC20 mandatory, ERC777 mandatory"},"balanceOfByTranche(address,uint256)":{"notice":"EIP1410 proposal"},"burn(address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"process to burn equity_burn function can be used by Company AND private token holder, burn is a shell and important to fullfil onlyOwner requirementcompliant with ERC777 & EIP1410"},"burnByTranche(uint256,address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"burn function can be used by Company AND private token holder, important to fullfil onlyOwner requirement"},"clearRequest(bytes32)":{"notice":"advocate can clear a companies request, changing status pending into active token"},"decimals()":{"notice":"ERC20 optional, ERC777 mandatory to be 18"},"defaultOperators()":{"notice":"ERC777 mandatory"},"disableERC20()":{"notice":"disables the ERC20 interface. "},"enableERC20()":{"notice":"enables the ERC20 interface."},"getBalanceOfInEth(address)":{"notice":"convert balance of token in ETH or other currencies"},"getDefaultTranches(address)":{"notice":"gets the tranches of a token holder, in general the default tranche for a transaction is the latest issued tranche an owner posseses"},"getProposals()":{"notice":"for EVM could be possible to work with fixed array e.g. 3 proposals"},"granularity()":{"notice":"ERC777 mandatory"},"isControllable()":{"notice":"provides transparency wether defaultOperators can be adjusted by company: if government address is set company changed it and is thus not controllable (return false)"},"isOperatorFor(address,address)":{"notice":"check whether the _operator address is allowed to manage the tokens held by _tokenHolder address.ERC777 mandatory"},"mint(uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"notice":"process to mint new equitycompliant with ERC777 & EIP1410"},"name()":{"notice":"event quaterlyUpdate(uint _revenue, uint _revenueforecast);ERC20 optional, ERC777 mandatory"},"operatorBurn(address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"ERC777 mandatory"},"operatorBurnByTranche(uint256,address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"EIP1400 mandatory"},"revokeOperator(address)":{"notice":"revoke a third party _operator's rights to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens.ERC777 mandatory, EIP1400 & EIP1410 in discussionit may be that regulations require an issuer or a trusted third party to retain the power thus it can be that revoking an operator MUST NOT be allowed"},"setDocument(bytes32,string,bytes32)":{"notice":"EIP1400 proposal"},"startBallot(bytes32[])":{"notice":"create a new ballot, only possible for owner of company"},"stopIssuance()":{"notice":"owner can stop issuance, not revertable!EIP1400 nodes.documentation:
@notice gets the tranches of a token holder, in general the default tranche for a transaction is the latest issued tranche an owner posseses
@dev mandatory for backward interoperability with ERC777 and ERC20
nodes.name: getDefaultTranches

attributes.documentation:
@notice gets the tranches of a token holder, in general the default tranche for a transaction is the latest issued tranche an owner posseses
@dev mandatory for backward interoperability with ERC777 and ERC20
attributes.name: getDefaultTranches

approve(address,uint256).details: sender can approve an amount to be withdrawn by spender

balanceOfByTranche(address,uint256).details: balance for any owner for specific tranche

createToken(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).details: creates new token shell (status pending), safes information in storage

params._granularity: ensures, that granularity of shares is always a positive natural figure, cannot be changed ever

decimals().details: number of decimals token uses, divide token amount by number of decimals to get user representation

delegate(address).details: possibility to delegate your vote to another voter

getDefaultTranches(address).details: mandatory for backward interoperability with ERC777 and ERC20

getInfosEquityToken().details: returns Infos of equity token, as struct is not returnable in current solidity version

granularity().details: smallest part of token not divisible

sendAdHocMessage(string).details: possibility to broadcast adHocMessages for any size

setDocument(bytes32,string,bytes32).details: manage documents associated with token, using IPFS encrypted peer-to-peer filesharing

vote(uint256).details: give your vote for specific proposal

winningProposal().details: computes the winning proposal, gets proposal name from array and returns, fires event

authorizeAdvocate(address).notice: authorize a third party _operator to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens. msg.sender always operator himself, thus requirementERC777 mandatory

authorizeOperator(address).notice: authorize a third party _operator to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens. msg.sender always operator himself, thus requirementERC777 mandatory

authorizeRequest(address).notice: advocate can approve investor to another level of accreditation; 0 = no investor, 1 = approved investor, 2 = advocate

burn(address,uint256,bytes).notice: process to burn equity_burn function can be used by Company AND private token holder, burn is a shell and important to fullfil onlyOwner requirementcompliant with ERC777 & EIP1410

burnByTranche(uint256,address,uint256,by.notice: burn function can be used by Company AND private token holder, important to fullfil onlyOwner requirement

clearRequest(bytes32).notice: advocate can clear a companies request, changing status pending into active token

decimals().notice: ERC20 optional, ERC777 mandatory to be 18

getBalanceOfInEth(address).notice: convert balance of token in ETH or other currencies

getDefaultTranches(address).notice: gets the tranches of a token holder, in general the default tranche for a transaction is the latest issued tranche an owner posseses

getProposals().notice: for EVM could be possible to work with fixed array e.g. 3 proposals

isControllable().notice: provides transparency wether defaultOperators can be adjusted by company: if government address is set company changed it and is thus not controllable (return false)

isOperatorFor(address,address).notice: check whether the _operator address is allowed to manage the tokens held by _tokenHolder address.ERC777 mandatory

mint(uint256,bytes,bytes).notice: process to mint new equitycompliant with ERC777 & EIP1410

name().notice: event quaterlyUpdate(uint _revenue, uint _revenueforecast);ERC20 optional, ERC777 mandatory

revokeOperator(address).notice: revoke a third party _operator's rights to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens.ERC777 mandatory, EIP1400 & EIP1410 in discussionit may be that regulations require an issuer or a trusted third party to retain the power thus it can be that revoking an operator MUST NOT be allowed

startBallot(bytes32[]).notice: create a new ballot, only possible for owner of company

stopIssuance().notice: owner can stop issuance, not revertable!EIP1400 mandatory
